This operation returns an instance of 'TranslationJob' type.                                                                                                               |

| [pullTranslation({ escapedItemId, })](./open-api-client.translationservice.pulltranslation.md)                                  | <code>static</code> | <p>Pulls a translation for a specified item by creating a pull translation job containing the item and sending it to translation. This operation returns an instance of 'TranslationJob' type.</p><p>This route is used as HATEOAS URL for the tm:PullTranslation Applicable Action</p>   |
| [pushTranslation({ escapedItemId, })](./open-api-client.translationservice.pushtranslation.md)                                  | <code>static</code> | <p>Pushes the specified item into translation by creating a push translation job containing the item and sending it to translation. This operation returns an instance of 'TranslationJob' type.</p><p>This route is used as HATEOAS URL for the tm:PushTranslation Applicable Action</p> |
| [retryTranslationJob({ jobId, })](./open-api-client.translationservice.retrytranslationjob.md)                                  | <code>static</code> | Retries to send or retrieve a translation job. | [sendTranslationJob({ jobId, })](./open-api-client.translationservice.sendtranslationjob.md)                                    | <code>static</code> | Sends a job for translation.
